me.title: Hello.
me.content: My name is vinh, I'm a programmer. This is my corner on the Internet. I mostly write about technology related stuffs, my family, some time I also mention my trust in Jesus Christ, my Savior.

entry.title: World Election Day
entry.author: vinh
entry.content: In next few days, the USA will finalize their leader, one 74 and the other 77. Let's see if Trump could make-America-great-again or Biden could make COVID disappear.
